title: Nicolás Rojo
text:
I am a Physicist/Chemist bridging the gap between Quantum Mechanics and Code.
Currently working on: * MSc Thesis: Optimal Control for Spin Chains (Krotov Method). * Research: Tensor Networks & Open Quantum Systems. * Dev: Python, Quarto & High-Performance Computing.
